alert.note: Alert for Dripping Springs; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Superior (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 23 at 12:34PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila and Pinal Counties through 115 PM MST... At 1233 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Superior. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Superior and Boyce Thompson Arboretum. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 221 and 232. AZ Route 177 between mile markers 159 and 167. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Dripping Springs; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Superior
